NRC (Nutrient Requirements of Nonhuman Primates: Second Revised Edition 2003) introduces the nutritient requirements for nonhuman primates. Protein is important for animals, because it is the vital source for amino acid.

Conversion from nitrogen to protein values is conventionally accomplished by multiplying by 6.25, if we can detect the total nitrogen in the food.
